name: testcookie-nginx-module
body:
Description
===========

**testcookie-nginx-module** is a simple robot mitigation module using cookie based challenge/response technique.

Challenge cookies can be set using different methods:

*   "Set-Cookie" + 301 HTTP Location redirect
*   "Set-Cookie" + HTML meta refresh redirect

![Simple mode](http://habrastorage.org/storage2/039/931/1a9/0399311a9a4257fd6298fe1e2d4e098c.png)

*   Custom template, JavaScript can be used here.

![Javascript mode](http://habrastorage.org/storage2/5a2/d5a/3cf/5a2d5a3cf0fed6ebfc3865556ef65c54.png)


To prevent automatic parsing, challenge cookie value can be encrypted with AES-128 in CBC mode using custom/random key and iv, and then decrypted at client side with JavaScript using [SlowAES](http://code.google.com/p/slowaes/).

If you need Flash or Captcha, check [testcookie-flash-processor](http://github.com/kyprizel/testcookie-flash-processor).
